sentences.en: ...low-paid menial jobs, such as cleaning and domestic work.
sentences.cn: …工钱少又卑微的工作，诸如打扫清洁或做家务。

sentences.en: A person who does tedious , menial, or unpleasant work.
sentences.cn: 做苦工的人做单调 、 卑贱或不愉快工作的人.

sentences.en: Able to receive menial labour instruction and to do menial jobs.
sentences.cn: 愿意接受服务指导和从事服务工作.

sentences.en: He is far too qualified for such a menial position.
sentences.cn: 他做那样卑贱的工作,未免太可惜了.

sentences.en: He was forced to take a series of menial jobs.
sentences.cn: 他被迫做一连串琐碎的杂活.

sentences.en: He'll take anything, even a menial kitchen job.
sentences.cn: 他愿意做任何事, 甚至是厨房里的杂役.

sentences.en: Hurstwood is hired by a different hotel to do menial jobs.
sentences.cn: 赫斯特伍德却在另一家旅馆里打杂.

sentences.en: I think he is far too qualified for such a menial position.
sentences.cn: 我觉得让他来做这样低贱的工作实在是太可惜了.

sentences.en: I was made to do a good deal of menial work.
sentences.cn: 我被指使去做许多下人的工作.

sentences.en: It delighted him to perform menial offices.
sentences.cn: 履行仆人的职责使他心花怒放.

sentences.en: Jesus specialized in menial tasks that everyone else tried to avoid: washing feet, helping children, fixing breakfast, and serving lepers.
sentences.cn: 耶稣专做一些每个人都想避免的卑微工作：洗脚、帮助小孩、预备早餐及服事麻疯病人。

sentences.en: Just a generation ago, women were largely confined to repetitive, menial jobs.
sentences.cn: 就在上一代人, 女性被限制于主要从事重复生产 、 仆人工作.

sentences.en: Manual or menial labor, such as barracks cleaning, assigned to soldiers.
sentences.cn: 劳务杂役分派给士兵的一年一次或两次的杂役(如打扫军营)

sentences.en: One who does menial work ; a drudge.
sentences.cn: 她做起事来几乎都是 四平八稳.

sentences.en: She hated such menial tasks as washing the pots and pans.
sentences.cn: 她憎恶洗锅擦盘之类低贱的工作.

sentences.en: There is a positive attitude here, from the boss down to the lowliest menial.
sentences.cn: 在这里上至老板下至最低微的下人,都有很积极的态度.

sentences.en: They believed that these life of menial work for granted, will not undermine the dignity.
sentences.cn: 他们认为,做这些生活中的粗活理所当然, 绝对无损体面.

words.tran_cn: 卑微的；仆人的；适合仆人做的
仆人；住家佣工；下贱的人

trans.tran_cn: （指工作）卑贱的，不体面的，枯燥的
trans.tran_en: Menial work is very boring, and the people who do it have a low status and are usually badly paid
